project.description:
First job created for this project, so consider this a work-in-progress and eternal rough draft.
This job will build Docker images and then run Docker compose to get them all up-and-running.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_USING_CACHE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: true or false, do you want to build the Docker images with the current Docker cache?

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# debugging information when reviewing jenkins build output pwd whoami
# download project repository git clone https://github.com/JacobBHartman/feoh.git cd feoh
# spin up containers if [ "${BUILD_USING_CACHE}" -eq "true" ]; then docker-compose build elif [ "${BUILD_USING_ACHE}" -eq "false" ]; then docker-compose build --no-cache fi docker-compose down docker-compose up --detach
